Name: Oğuzhan Kandakoğlu
Description: Full stack web developer with a passion for creating web applications using technologies such as JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Experienced in various web development domains and committed to delivering outstanding user experiences. Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset. Dedicated to staying updated with the latest trends and innovations to enhance the quality and performance of work.

Experience.title: Full Stack Developer
Experience.description: Developing and maintaining web applications with multiple teams using Next.js and Firebase. Primarily focused on AI applications, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create innovative solutions.

Experience.title: Game Developer & Co-Founder
Experience.description: Developed several hyper-casual games for Android and iOS platforms using Unity and C#. Co-founded the company and managed apps' key performance indicators (KPIs) and team.

Experience.title: Web Developer Intern
Experience.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of web applications using JavaScript and React. Managed databases using T-SQL and PL-SQL. Collaborated with a team to build a web application for one of Turkey's largest critical infrastructures.

Education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
Education.description: Completed coursework in web development, software engineering, and computer science. Graduated with Honor Degree.

Certifications.title: Develhope Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
Certifications.description: Develhope Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp is a 6-month intensive program that provides students with the skills and knowledge to become a full stack web developer.

Certifications.title: AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
Certifications.description: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals certification is an entry-level certification that demonstrates foundational knowledge of cloud concepts, Azure services, security, privacy, compliance, and trust.

ProjectList.title: What Should I Watch - Ai Movie Recommendation App
ProjectList.description: 'What Should I Watch', an AI-driven platform that offers personalized movie recommendations based on users' emotions and preferences. Developed user-friendly interface, advanced algorithms, and integrated with popular streaming platforms.

ProjectList.title: Mailio - Personal Ai E-mail assistant
ProjectList.description: Mailio is an innovative chat and email assistant designed to optimize professional communication. With its intelligent features and real-time suggestions, Mailio facilitates the composition of effective messages, ensuring clarity and professionalism in interactions. By streamlining workflows, saving time, and enhancing messaging skills, Mailio empowers users to maximize their communication efficiency.

ProjectList.title: OZXK Blog | Full Stack React Project
ProjectList.description: This project involved the creation of a personal blog site using React, Next.js, Node.js and SASS. The implementation also included the development of a content management system (CMS) utilizing Node.js and MongoDB. The CMS allows for seamless creation and editing of blog posts, as well as efficient management of website settings. The source code for this project can be found on GitHub.

ProjectList.title: Freelance Wordpress Projects
ProjectList.description: Developed and launched 6 live WordPress websites for diverse clients across various industries. Created websites for local businesses, e-commerce platforms, and learning management systems. Acquired expertise in SEO implementation, caching strategies, minification and lazy loading techniques, and UI/UX design principles. Collaborated closely with clients to understand their requirements and deliver customized solutions. Ensured websites were responsive, user-friendly, and optimized for performance.
